item.title: Joplin Vim Mode
item.description: How could I not find out that there’s Vim mode in Joplin? I could’ve saved my time configuring _vimrc and pressing :w over and over again.

item.title: Progress
item.description: If I don’t post anything, I can’t feel my progress. If I can’t feel my progress, I get stuck on changing the same text. In term of writing novel, should quantity be favoured over quality? Is there a way to quantity progress if I can’t predict when and how the project is going to be completed?

item.title: Winter
item.description: It is so cold. I thought it would be warmer since the sunlight was so bright last week as if it were August. Sunny days can’t go on forever.
